foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

constantValues: Value of the Order Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Order Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: discountPercentage

members.name: submitDate

constantValues: Enter the date when the order was submitted to the fulfillment or shipping center.

members.description: Enter the date when the order was submitted to the fulfillment or shipping center.

members.name: submitStatus

constantValues: Type the code for the submitted status in the fulfillment or shipping center system.

members.description: Type the code for the submitted status in the fulfillment or shipping center system.

members.name: submitStatusDescription

constantValues: Type additional details or notes about the order for the fulfillment or shipping center.

members.description: Type additional details or notes about the order for the fulfillment or shipping center.

members.name: totalAmount

constantValues: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the order.

members.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the order.

members.name: totalAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreight

constantValues: Shows the total product amount for the order, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the order.

members.description: Shows the total product amount for the order, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount due for the order.

members.name: totalAmountLessFreightBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the order.

members.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the order.

members.name: totalDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemAmount

constantValues: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the order, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the order, based on the specified price list and quantities.

members.name: totalLineItemAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmount

constantValues: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the order. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the order and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the order.

members.description: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the order. This value is reflected in the Detail Amount field on the order and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the order.

members.name: totalLineItemDiscountAmountBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

members.name: totalTax

constantValues: Shows the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the order, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the order.

members.description: Shows the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the order, included in the Total Amount due calculation for the order.

members.name: totalTaxBase

constantValues: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

members.name: willCall

constantValues: Select whether the products included in the order should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick-up or delivery instructions.

members.description: Select whether the products included in the order should be shipped to the specified address or held until the customer calls with further pick-up or delivery instructions.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows the duration in minutes for which the order was on hold.

members.description: Shows the duration in minutes for which the order was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the sales order record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the sales order record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this sales order. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Last SLA that was applied to this sales order. This field is for internal use only.

members.name: accountId

constantValues: Shows the parent account related to the record. This information is used to link the sales order to the account selected in the Customer field for reporting and analytics.

members.description: Shows the parent account related to the record. This information is used to link the sales order to the account selected in the Customer field for reporting and analytics.

members.name: contactId

constantValues: Shows the parent contact related to the record. This information is used to link the contract to the contact selected in the Customer field for reporting and analytics.

members.description: Shows the parent contact related to the record. This information is used to link the contract to the contact selected in the Customer field for reporting and analytics.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Shows the campaign that the order was created from.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Shows the campaign that the order was created from.
